abstract: A round-up of some of the discussions taking place this week about net neutrality and the future of the Internet.
snippet: A round-up of some of the discussions taking place this week about net neutrality and the future of the Internet.
lead_paragraph: The debate over net neutrality is in full swing this week after Google and Verizon introduced a proposal for regulation that would exempt wireless access from open-access rules.

headline.main: More on the Net Neutrality Debate
